name: Item - Priest T16 Healer 4P Bonus
description: Circle of Healing and Prayer of Mending casts increase the effect of your next Holy Word: Serenity by 33% and your Holy Word: Chastise and Sanctuary spells by 75%, stacking up to 3 times. When you activate Archangel, you gain 5% haste and 0 mastery.
